#summary Development environment under MS Windows


= Introduction =

 This should be a good starting point for all MS Windows developers.


= Details =

 ==  Main stuff (Required)  ==
        <table cellspacing=10>
         <tr align="left"><th> - Python 2.7  </th><th> http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.5/</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> + PyGTK all-in-one </th><th> http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/binaries/win32/pygtk/2.24/</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> + PIL </th><th> http://www.pythonware.com/products/pil/</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> + pyserial </th><th> http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyserial/</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> + lxml </th><th> https://pypi.python.org/pypi/lxml/2.2.8</th></tr>



        </table><br>
        If you want to build the win installer you need:
        <table cellspacing=10>
         <tr align="left"><th> - py2exe   </th><th> http://www.py2exe.org/</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> - NSIS     </th><th> http://nsis.sourceforge.net/Download</th></tr>
         <tr align="left"><th> - NSIS AccessControl plug-in    </th><th> http://nsis.sourceforge.net/AccessControl_plug-in</th></tr>
        </table>
        <br><br>
        One of the best editors for Python and NSIS scripts is [http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/uk/download.php Notepad++]<br>
        and a more complete NSIS IDE is [http://hmne.sourceforge.net/ HM NIS EDIT]

 ==  Source Code  ==
         * View the HEAD revision directly at http://code.google.com/p/gmapcatcher/source/browse/#svn/trunk
         * Check out a working copy using [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads TortoiseSVN]

         [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads http://gmapcatcher.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/TortoiseCheckout.png] {{{tsvn:http://gmapcatcher.googlecode.com/svn/trunk}}}

</br></br>
